title: The Perfect Union
description: Book one in the Perfect Love Series Two men, one woman and the desire to experience passion beyond their wildest dreams. Calleigh Wells has spent the last three years rebuilding her life after being notified of the death of her husband in Iraq. On that darkest day of her life she met Rick Conner and Conor McGuire. Two men who share a bond beyond mere friendship. Since then the three have become inseparable. Both men have become surrogate fathers to Calleigh's twin boys. They've created an unusual family filled with love, friendship, and support. However, lately Calleigh's dreams have been filled with feverish images of sweat slicked skin and twisting limbs. Of three. Unbeknownst to her Rick and Conor have also hungered to expand their friendship to new reaches. What will happen when all is revealed? Reader Advisory: This book contains scenes of menage sex, champagne, and a sexy Irish accent."
author: Trina Lane
